ethan sita me dakwa sampurna kalayama pahe sandhanaye mahalekam lesa janadhipathiwarana, mahamathiwarana, palath sabha ha palath palana aayathana mathiwaranawala siyallehima nama yojana pathra sakas kirima, ha mathiwaranawalata adala siyalu katayuthu susil premajayanyath wisin sandhanaye lekamwaraya lesa itu kaleya.mahinda rajapaksha samaye 2005 sita 2010 dakwa adhyapana amathya dhurayada 2010 sita 2014 dakwa khanija sampath amathyaya dhurayada mohu wisin usulana ladi.2010 agosthu 17 wana sanduda mathiwaranayak pawathwimata niyamithawa thibiyadi agosthu 14 wana sikurada eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye mahalekam lesa susil premajayantha ta saha shri lanka nidahas pakshaye mahalekam lesa anura priyadarshana yapa yana ayata ema thanathuru darima walakwalamin kolambaa disa adhikaranaya warana niyogayak nikuth kaleya.
